title: The Impact of Teaching Presence on Social and Cognitive Presence in Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in online learning environments and basic language education theories
context.additional_context: Language education courses for in-service professionals, conducted in a BYOD environment with formative assessments centered on discussions and assignments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three core elements of the CoI framework: teaching, social, and cognitive presence
Learners can analyze the impact of direct instruction and discussion facilitation strategies on social presence in blended learning
Learners can apply mechanisms for enhancing cognitive learning outcomes through teaching presence mediated by social presence in design proposals
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
